::: I am Giorgio Paulon, Statistical Scientist at [Berry Consultants](https://www.berryconsultants.com/) where I work on designing and analyzing innovative and adaptive clinical trials. I completed my PhD in Statistics at The University of Texas at Austin under the joint supervision of [Abhra Sarkar](https://abhrastat.github.io) and [Peter Müller](https://www.ma.utexas.edu/users/pmueller/). ::: {layout-ncol=2} I am originally from Udine, Italy, and I obtained both my BSc and MSc at Politecnico di Milano in Mathematical Engineering. I also spent two years at École Centrale Paris, France, for a double degree program (T.I.M.E).
I love photography and I am passionate about travelling. **Photography** is a mental exercise that helps me to focus and to relax. **Travelling** gives me many motivations and helps me finding the unexpected outside of my daily routine. ![Udine, Italy](img/udine.jpg){fig-align="center"} :::
